headline.main: Allies Rout Foe's Convoy Off Buna; Shoot Down 23 Japanese Planes; JAPANESE CONVOY ROUTED OFF BUNA FOE CONSTRICTED FURTHER IN NEW GUINEA

lead_paragraph: AT UNITED NATIONS HEADQUARTERS in Australia, Thursday, Dec. 3 -- Allied airmen have downed twenty-three Japanese Zero planes and driven off a naval convoy that attempted to reinforce the entrapped Japanese at Buna, on the Northeast New Guinea coast, the High Command announced today.
abstract: Allied planes down 28 Jap Zeros and drive off naval convoy trying to reinforce entrapped Jap forces, Buna; Allied ground forces gain in drives toward Buna and Sanananda, land action and air aid described; map
